channel.title: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++
channel.description: Hey guys just wandering if anyone know how to make certen item's only for donator like if you are not a doantor and you try to where it it say's you are not a donator If anyone could help will get rep++

item.title: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Or in Your source folder in the items.java file scroll down to you see something like this

public static int Barrows[] = {4734,4710,4724,4726,4728,4730,4718,4718,4732,4736,4738,4716,4720,4722,4753,4747,4755,4757,4759,4708,4712,4714,4745,4749,4751,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462}

above or below that add

public static final int[] donator_items = {1007};

just incase a other method doesnt work out

Read full topic
item.source: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++

item.title: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“ii bandos ii, post:8, topic:384426”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=480192.msg3515286#msg3515286 date=1298930800]
Ok, search for this in ItemAssistant.java

boolean canWearItem = true; public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0;

Under that, add

[code]if ((wearID == 35) && (c.isDonator != 1)) {

c.sendMessage(“You need to be a donator to wear this!”);
return false;

}[/code]

Try that
[/quote]

Thanx that help’s alot![/quote]

Sure np.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Ok, search for this in ItemAssistant.java

boolean canWearItem = true; public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0;

Under that, add

[code]if ((wearID == 35) && (c.isDonator != 1)) {

c.sendMessage(“You need to be a donator to wear this!”);
return false;

}[/code]

Try that

item.title: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

Guhtwables:

You will need to go into i think item.cfg and change the “Donor Right”, To 1

thanx When i make the right then on item.cfg let’s say i take ags item = 35 Armadyl_godsword This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur. 500 500 500 0 160 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 140 8 where do i write in for it to be donator

item.title: Donator Item's Who help's get's Repp++
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:2, topic:384426”][quote author=ii bandos ii link=topic=480192.msg3515260#msg3515260 date=1298929400]
Hey guys just wandering if anyone know how to make certen item’s only for donator like if you are not a doantor and you try to where it it say’s you are not a donator If anyone could help will get rep++
[/quote]

You have to make a new player right and set it to only that player right or higher[/quote]
That’s kind of confusing :\

Read full topic
